text: Saint-Louis is a commune. It is in the Haut-Rhin department. In 2015, 20,401 people lived there. The inhabitants are the Ludoviciens. It is at the German and Swiss borders, just north of Basel. The EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse- Freiburg is there. The commune of Saint-Louis also has the former villages of Bourgfelden and Neuweg in it. Category:Communes in Haut-Rhin
title: Saint-Louis, Haut-Rhin
